languages.text: {n}Сам же плененный человек — если его все еще можно назвать человеком — кажется просто гигантом в сравнении с сопровождающими его блюстителями. Смертоносная сталь матово сверкает в обрамлении выцветших алых роб, руки смиренно сложены, мехадендриты застыли в покое.{/n} "Я приветствую властител{mf|я|ьницу} сего прекрасного корабля-храма и смиренно прошу прощения за незваное вторжение".

{n}The captured man — if he can be called that — looks positively gigantic next to the enforcers at his side. Deadly-looking metal gleams dimly beneath his faded crimson robes, his hands are folded obediently, and his mechadendrites are perfectly still.{/n} "I greet the master of this vessel-cathedral and offer my humble apologies for this unbidden intrusion."
languages.original_text: {n}Сам же плененный человек — если его все еще можно назвать человеком — кажется просто гигантом в сравнении с сопровождающими его блюстителями. Смертоносная сталь матово сверкает в обрамлении выцветших алых роб, руки смиренно сложены, мехадендриты застыли в покое.{/n} "Я приветствую властител{mf|я|ьницу} сего прекрасного корабля-храма и смиренно прошу прощения за незваное вторжение".

traits.locale_text: {n}The captured man — if he can be called that — looks positively gigantic next to the enforcers at his side. Deadly-looking metal frame gleams dimly beneath his faded crimson robes, his hands are folded obediently, and his mechadendrites are perfectly still.{/n} "I greet the master of this vessel-cathedral and offer my humble apologies for this unbidden intrusion."

Deadly-looking metal gleams dimly beneath his faded crimson robes, his hands are folded obediently, and his mechadendrites are perfectly still.{/n} "I greet the master of this vessel-cathedral and offer my humble apologies for this unbidden intrusion."

languages.text: {n}捕らわれた男、と言えるかは定かではないが、その男はエンフォーサーの隣にいると明らかに大きく見える。色褪せた紅のローブの下にはおぞましい見た目の金属がぼんやりと光り、彼の手は従順に組まれ、そして彼の機械触手は完全に停止している。{/n}「この大聖堂船の艦長にご挨拶と、勝手な立ち入りについて謝罪を申し上げたい」
languages.original_text: {n}The captured man — if he can be called that — looks positively gigantic next to the enforcers at his side. Deadly-looking metal gleams dimly beneath his faded crimson robes, his hands are folded obediently, and his mechadendrites are perfectly still.{/n} "I greet the master of this vessel-cathedral and offer my humble apologies for this unbidden intrusion."

traits.locale_text: {n}捕らわれた男、と言えるかは定かではないが、その男はエンフォーサーの隣にいると明らかに大きく見える。色褪せた紅のローブの下にはおぞましい見た目の金属がぼんやりと光り、彼の手は従順に組まれ、そして彼の機械触手は完全に停止している。{/n}「この大聖堂船の艦長にご挨拶と、勝手な立ち入りについて謝罪を申し上げたい」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: {n}那个遭到羁押的大块头似乎已经无法再被称为人类。与周围的执法者相比，他的身材实在是过于高大。他褪了色的深红长袍下，致命的金属框架在隐隐约约地闪烁。他的双手顺从地交叉在一起，机械触须完全静止不动。{/n}“我向这座舰船教堂的主人致意，并为我的不请自来深表谦卑的歉意。”
languages.original_text: {n}The captured man — if he can be called that — looks positively gigantic next to the enforcers at his side. Deadly-looking metal gleams dimly beneath his faded crimson robes, his hands are folded obediently, and his mechadendrites are perfectly still.{/n} "I greet the master of this vessel-cathedral and offer my humble apologies for this unbidden intrusion."

traits.locale_text: {n}那个遭到羁押的大块头似乎已经无法再被称为人类。与周围的执法者相比，他的身材实在是过于高大。他褪了色的深红长袍下，致命的金属框架在隐隐约约地闪烁。他的双手顺从地交叉在一起，机械触须完全静止不动。{/n}“我向这座舰船教堂的主人致意，并为我的不请自来深表谦卑的歉意。”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: {n}Der gefangene Mann — wenn man ihn denn so nennen kann — sieht neben den Enforcers aus wie ein Riese. Tödlich anmutendes Metall glänzt dumpf unter seinen verblichenen roten Roben. Seine Hände sind gehorsam verschränkt, seine Mechadendriten vollkommen still.{/n} "Ich grüße {mf|den Meister|die Meisterin} dieser Schiffskathedrale und bitte demütigst um Entschuldigung für mein ungebetenes Eindringen."
languages.original_text: {n}The captured man — if he can be called that — looks positively gigantic next to the enforcers at his side. Deadly-looking metal gleams dimly beneath his faded crimson robes, his hands are folded obediently, and his mechadendrites are perfectly still.{/n} "I greet the master of this vessel-cathedral and offer my humble apologies for this unbidden intrusion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der gefangene Mann — wenn man ihn denn so nennen kann — sieht neben den Enforcers aus wie ein Riese. Tödlich anmutendes Metall glänzt dumpf unter seinen verblichenen roten Roben. Seine Hände sind gehorsam verschränkt, seine Mechadendriten vollkommen still.{/n} "Ich grüße {mf|den Meister|die Meisterin} dieser Schiffskathedrale und bitte demütigst um Entschuldigung für mein ungebetenes Eindringen."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: {n}L'homme capturé, si on peut l'appeler ainsi, paraît gigantesque à côté des prévôts qui l'encadrent. Sa robe écarlate défraîchie laisse entrevoir le métal terne de ses redoutables implants. Tandis qu'il croise docilement les mains, ses mécadendrites demeurent parfaitement immobiles.{/n} « Permettez-moi de saluer {mf|le|la} capitaine de ce vaisseau-cathédrale et de lui présenter mes humbles excuses pour cette intrusion. »
languages.original_text: {n}The captured man — if he can be called that — looks positively gigantic next to the enforcers at his side. Deadly-looking metal gleams dimly beneath his faded crimson robes, his hands are folded obediently, and his mechadendrites are perfectly still.{/n} "I greet the master of this vessel-cathedral and offer my humble apologies for this unbidden intrusion."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme capturé, si on peut l'appeler ainsi, paraît gigantesque à côté des prévôts qui l'encadrent. Sa robe écarlate défraîchie laisse entrevoir le métal terne de ses redoutables implants. Tandis qu'il croise docilement les mains, ses méchadendrites demeurent parfaitement immobiles.{/n} « Permettez-moi de saluer {mf|le|la} capitaine de ce vaisseau-cathédrale et de lui présenter mes humbles excuses pour cette intrusion. »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: {n}El hombre capturado, si es que puede considerarse tal, es un gigante al lado de los guardias que lo custodian. Un metal de aspecto mortífero reluce bajo su túnica de descolorido carmesí, tiene las manos cruzadas en gesto de sumisión y sus mecadendritas están totalmente inmóviles.{/n} «Saludo {mf|al ilustre señor|a la ilustre señora} de esta nave-catedral y le ofrezco mis más humildes disculpas por este inopinado allanamiento».
languages.original_text: {n}The captured man — if he can be called that — looks positively gigantic next to the enforcers at his side. Deadly-looking metal gleams dimly beneath his faded crimson robes, his hands are folded obediently, and his mechadendrites are perfectly still.{/n} "I greet the master of this vessel-cathedral and offer my humble apologies for this unbidden intrusion."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre capturado, si es que puede considerarse tal, es un gigante al lado de los guardias que lo custodian. Un metal de aspecto mortífero reluce bajo su túnica de descolorido carmesí, tiene las manos cruzadas en gesto de sumisión y sus mecadendritas están totalmente inmóviles.{/n} «Saludo {mf|al ilustre señor|a la ilustre señora} de esta nave-catedral y le ofrezco mis más humildes disculpas por este inopinado allanamiento».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: {n}Yakalanmış adam... Yani kendisine böyle denilip denilemeyeceği belirsiz olan mahkûm, yanındaki infazcılarla kıyaslandığında gerçek anlamda bir dev gibi görünüyor. Ölümcül görünen metal parçalar, rengi solmuş kırmızı cübbesinin altından donukça parıldıyor. Elleri uysalca katlanmış, mekadentritleri ise tamamen cansız duruyor.{/n} "Bu gemi katedralin efendisini selamlıyor, izinsiz girdiğim için naçizane özürlerimi sunuyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The captured man — if he can be called that — looks positively gigantic next to the enforcers at his side. Deadly-looking metal gleams dimly beneath his faded crimson robes, his hands are folded obediently, and his mechadendrites are perfectly still.{/n} "I greet the master of this vessel-cathedral and offer my humble apologies for this unbidden intrusion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yakalanmış adam... Bu şahsa adam denebilir mi? Mahkûm, yanındaki infazcılarla kıyaslandığında, gerçek anlamda bir dev gibi görünüyor. Ölümcül görünen metal parçalar, rengi solmuş kırmızı cübbesinin altından donukça parıldıyor. Elleri uysalca katlanmış, mekadentritleri ise tamamen cansız duruyor.{/n} "Bu gemi katedralin efendisini selamlıyor, izinsiz girdiğim için naçizane özürlerimi sunuyorum."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
